entry.note: {0} is a repository ID or a user input referring to a repository

message.entry: Repository ''{0}'' does not exist in the list of known repositories.
Constructing a matlab.mpm.Repository is not permitted.

entry.note: {0} is repository name or location and {1} is reasoning

message.entry: Unable to add to the known repository list.
Unable to accept off-list matlab.mpm.Repository objects.\n\nConsider calling mpmAddRepository with the object's "Location" and a new "Name" instead.
Off-list matlab.mpm.Repository objects do not have ''Name'' properties.\n\nConsider calling mpmAddRepository with the object's "Location" and a new "Name" instead.
Not enough input arguments. Repository Name and Location are required when adding a repository.
Too many arguments. Location is not required with matlab.mpm.Repository.
Location ''{0}'' can only refer to a single repository name.
Unable to add repository ''{0}''. Another repository refers to this location already.
Name ''{0}'' can only refer to a single repository location.
Unable to name repository ''{0}''. Another repository has this name already.

entry.note: {0} is a repository name or location

message.entry: Multiple repositories may not share location/name ''{0}''.
Unable to name repository ''{0}''. Another repository refers to this location already.
Unable to add repository ''{0}''. Another repository has this name already.
Repository location must be in the MATLAB Repository List: ''{0}''.

entry.note: {0} is repository name, {1} is package ID, and {2} and {3} are package root paths

message.entry: Repository ''{0}'' contains the same package ''{1}'' at locations ''{2}'' and ''{3}''.
